thread.title: Mark Wright suffers embarrassing moment with Little Mix backstage at the BRITs
thread.title_full: Mark Wright suffers embarrassing moment with Little Mix backstage at the BRITs

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Mark Wright suffers embarrassing moment with Little Mix backstage at the BRITs
text:
Mark Wright suffers embarrassing moment with Little Mix backstage at the BRITs Michelle Keeganâ€™s husband admits this made him cringe Share   Mark Wright has an embarrassing moment with Little Mix Share this video Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Mark Wright was on top of the world at the BRIT Awards tonight - that is until he completely embarrassed himself in front of Little Mix. 
The former TOWIE star was happily singing to himself when he was wandering around backstage. 
But unfortunately for the former TOWIE star, he bumped into Little Mix while he was obliviously singing away. 
And he admits he was left red-faced as he was actually singing one of THEIR songs. Mark Wright was caught out by Little Mix (Photo: Rex Features) 
"I was walking through the corridor on the way up here and it happened to be backstage and I started singing Shout Out To My Ex and as I was walking around the corner literally I walked into Jesy and Perrie from Little Mix," Mark confessed on ITV2 after the show. 
"And I was like UHHH."But he admitted the girls seemed to like his rendition of their hit. 
"They did like it, but it was a bit embarrassing for me," he added. Michelle Keegan and Mark Wright enjoy date night at the BRITs (Photo: WireImage) 
Earlier in the evening, Mark and his wife Michelle Keegan and Mark Wright put on a united front on the red carpet. 
The Our Girl star will shortly be jetting out to South Africa to spend around eight months filming the third series of the army drama - while Mark stays at their home in Essex. 
But tonight the happy couple made the most of their date night heading to the glitzy music awards ceremony in London. 
Michelle showed off her stunning figure in a bright blue jumpsuit.The strapless all-in-one showed off Michelle's every curve. Michelle wore a bright blue jumpsuit (Photo: Rex Features) Michelle flaunted her curves (Photo: PA) 
She wore her signature brunette locks in a voluminous blow out. 
The former Coronation Street actress let her natural beauty shine with a sweep of natural eyeshadow and glossy nude lipgloss. 
She made sure all the focus was on her eyes with a long pair of faux lashes. 
Meanwhile, Mark dressed down in a black polo neck top and matching jeans.
